name: Easter Egg Hunt
description:
Find all of the 30 easter eggs as fast as possible! If you find the golden egg, your time will decrease. 

Controls:

- WASD to move

- Use your mouse to move camera

- Left click to collect eggs. (Tip: you can hold left click down)

- To restart during a game, click on the R key 5 times.

- To restart after a game, click on the R key once.

- Click on the 1 key to decrease sensitivity.

- Click on the 2 key to increase sensitivity.

This is a simple game I made in about 4 hours. Hopefully you guys enjoy it!
